name: GetResponse
natural_language_description: 这是 GetResponse 节点。主要用于: Consume GetResponse API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiKey
available_options: API Key (值: apiKey)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact
available_options: Contact (值: contact)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new contact
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a contact
Get (值: get) - Get a contact
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many contacts
Update (值: update) - Update contact properties
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

campaignId.name: campaignId
campaignId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
campaignId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Campaign Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: customFieldsUi (值: None)
dayOfCycle (值: None) - The day on which the contact is in the Autoresponder cycle. null indicates the contacts is not in the cycle.
ipAddress (值: None) - The contact's IP address. IPv4 and IPv6 formats are accepted.
name (值: None)
note (值: None)
scoring (值: None) - Contact scoring, pass null to remove the score from a contact
tags (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: Unique identifier for a particular contact
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular contact | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: campaignId (值: None) - Search contacts by campaign ID
changeOnFrom (值: None) - Search contacts edited from this date
changeOnTo (值: None) - Search contacts edited to this date
createdOnFrom (值: None) - Count data from this date
createdOnTo (值: None) - Count data from this date

exactMatch (值: None) - Whether to search for contacts with the exact value of the email and name provided in the query string. Without this flag, matching is done via a standard 'like' comparison, which may sometimes be slow.
fields (值: None) - List of fields that should be returned. ID is always returned. Fields should be separated by comma
name (值: None) - Search contacts by name
origin (值: None) - Search contacts by origin
sortBy (值: None)
sortOrder (值: None)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: campaignId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
customFieldsUi (值: None)
dayOfCycle (值: None) - The day on which the contact is in the Autoresponder cycle. null indicates the contacts is not in the cycle.
email (值: None)
ipAddress (值: None) - The contact's IP address. IPv4 and IPv6 formats are accepted.
name (值: None)
note (值: None)
scoring (值: None) - Contact scoring, pass null to remove the score from a contact
tags (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
